original_text: And when they were come into the house, they saw the young child with Mary his mother, and fell down, and worshipped him: and when they had opened their treasures, they presented unto him gifts; gold, and frankincense and myrrh.
korean_text: 집에 들어가 아기와 그의 어머니 마리아가 함께 있는 것을 보고 엎드려 아기께 경배하고 보배합을 열어 황금과 유향과 몰약을 예물로 드리니라

sentences.original_text: And when they were come into the house
they saw the young child with Mary his mother
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어린 아이를 그의 어머니 마리아와 함께 보았다

sentences.original_text: and when they had opened their treasures
